testimonials.title: What Our Customer Says
testimonials.quote1: Just a quick note to say that I recently hired Valkyrie to do some quite complex coding work for me. He finished the job within a reasonable timeframe and to a very high standard with great communication throughout.
testimonials.quote2: Great job on my Cakephp scraper script! Easy to communicate with and even did a few additional tasks that were not apart of the project that were greatly appreciated! Will be hiring again for sure. ;-)

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.ans1: Weâ€™re working with our local partner company who is leading the local selection of highly educated talents in Malaysia. We can benefit from their 8 years of experience and local language.
faq.ques2: What administrative things will come up?
faq.ans2: We will take care of all administrative tasks, including payroll, taxes, and social security. You can focus on your project and the quality of your code.
faq.ques3: How do you handle overtime payouts?
faq.ans3: We will pay overtime according to the local law and the agreement with the talent. We will also ensure that the talent is not overworked and that the quality of the work is maintained.
faq.ques4: Can we change a talents workload from hourly based to full-time?
faq.ans4: Yes, you can change the workload of a talent at any time. We will adjust the contract and the payment accordingly.
faq.ques5: What's the difference between Flexible & Commitment?
faq.ans5: Flexible is a pay-as-you-go model with a minimum of 10 hours per month. Commitment is a monthly subscription with a fixed amount of hours per month.
faq.ques6: How does the employment setup looks like?
faq.ans6: We will employ the talent on your behalf. The talent will work exclusively for you and you will have full control over the work and the results.
faq.extraDesc: Canâ€™t find the answer youâ€™re looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.
